entry.title: Current Conditions: 11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 12:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 11.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 11.3°C
Wind: SE 65 km/h gust 81 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of thundershowers this evening and after midnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight then increasing to 50 gusting to 80. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
